title: Dzwaafu11
author: Dzwaafu11
content: We should please Mind wetin we go talk as these election don near, election will come and go we'll all move on with our lives but we choose to be tribal bigot because some of us dey get some certain things from a particular person for the country and people they praise you, make we they wise and think as everyone of us get right to vote for who he/she like, choose better person to make things good for us.

As them see man weh deh obviously sick and dementia and them say na him them go vite for to rule them, may Tinubu bless them with his mental capacity. Make I even ask as others deh ask on this matter, wetin deh with tinubu and corn? If it is not agbado today, na popcorn or roasted corn tomorrow.

comments.author: HajiBagi
comments.body: The way nigeria dey do him things no fit quickly change especially in time of election because mostly in election now everybody dey choose their tribe without even think of what will come for  them at the end after election, but due to what you say here now fit make one or two things come together because as nigeria matter be so now na youth get things to run for this coming election and make we no allow our minds be use with another people's make we use our heads do better for futures.

comments.author: Cryptomultiplier
comments.body: Majority of the time, na we dey be our own problem. The tribes wey dey this country plenty wella, and e still dey baffle me say some of or a particular persons go just decide say na by being tribalistic them go fit control he whole country. No be hidden something, as this issue of tribalism dey open to eyes and ears even during this campaign period.Election don come again, and same tin dey on repeat. No be tribe dey rule/control, na by wisdom and the input of a great team.Make we take clue, vote in the next leader of this country, not based on tribal sentiments, but by track record, sound expression and the application of wisdom, among other qualities.

comments.author: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange
comments.body: Quote from: HajiBagi on January 12, 2023, 04:21:20 PMThe way nigeria dey do him things no fit quickly change especially in time of election because mostly in election now everybody dey choose their tribe without even think of what will come for  them at the end after election, but due to what you say here now fit make one or two things come together because as nigeria matter be so now na youth get things to run for this coming election and make we no allow our minds be use with another people's make we use our heads do better for futures. Hey, mate, I think you are wrong to say everyone is choosing their tribe, because there are still a lot of people in the south-south and south-east who are fully supporting Tinubu. The Muslim religion happens to be more united in Nigeria than the Christians, which convinces me to believe that if all Christians are as united as Muslims and vote for the Pet Obi they so much desire, then the man may possibly win. If I were in Nigeria, I would vote for him because I see a lot of drama from the sick man Tinubu, who is so old and his leg are not even level on the ground. He reminds me of the former president of Zimbabwe (Robert Gabriel Mugabe). But honestly speaking, Tinubu is not the man for Nigeria, and yet not only the Hausas are in support of him; on the day of the election, the majority of his vote will still come from the south. If Tinubu succeeds in ruling Nigeria, then I wonder what the citizens will benefit from his government, but until then, I would not be too judgmental now. Because as it stands now, on the day of the election, I don't think you will see any Hausa men voting for Pet Obi, but why will the south vote for Tinubu?

comments.author: Cryptomiles1
comments.body: See, this country is more just of what we think because after election I believe there would be another selection from the INEC why, is then we'll know when the real leader would probably emerge from, You and I could be here crying for Mr. O to win while the rest people have worked underway to find their ways out from the rejection of entire Youth. So in essence, what I am trying say is that we should monitor INEC very well before they would manipulate our votes and turn them to be void while they are all valid post.Talking of minding our words. Due to the much pressure and popularity of Obidient movement is cause a lot of threat to the opposite parties, which for me i would say you should desist from talking about politics rather have it in mind to whom you want to vote in, this season there are lot of threat and pressure. Vote wisely because your PVC your Power.

comments.author: Asiska02
comments.body: People wey dey carry politics matter for head na people wey see say dem go get something out of it or people wey dey ignorant of the status quo. If you have relevant knowledge of the situation the country is facing you won’t fall for political tool trap. There’s need for reorientation of the status quo on political issues and we should shine our eyes to chose the right person this coming election. May the right people for the job succeed that will have the interest of the country at heart.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: Election is fast approaching and we are drawing closer to a new democratic dispensation which we all need to make our choice of candidature. I want to urge us all to make good use of our PVC because that would vindicate us in the long run if we made a good or bad choice. Note this, if the choice is good we are going to have it all and if otherwise, we are all on it too. We should have a rethink of the past years of experiences and what we have gone through as a nation and as individual, are we really okay with the current state of the nation? Do we still want to continue the current state of the nation for the next 4 years, if yes or no it is up to you to decide. Say no to election violence, say no to electoral fraud, say no to vote buying, say no to thuggery and ballot snatching, come out in masses to vote to get the desired change you want.Advise no be curse!

Abeg make we wise up, na time to think be this and use our PVC well.Long live Nigeria

As election d around the corner, vote rightly and make you no sell your vote for change(small money). If our country d good tomorrow, em d good for all of us. If em d bad tomorrow na all of us go suffer am. So you better use your tongue to count your teeth to avoid more hardship
